scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains four letters and an eight-page printed booklet titled "… Rules and Regulations for the Introduction of Gas… by the Trustees of the Philadelphia Gas Works." Two of the letters are to Alex Jeffrey from his brother John Jeffrey of Cincinnati, Ohio, regarding a business venture and stocks. A letter from J.R. Gavin and John Henry of Lexington, Kentucky, to Calvin Cogswell Morgan and Henrietta Morgan requests to meet to discuss John Wesley Hunt's will (March 8, 1851).
